title: [K-12] Web-Based Case-Centered Learning Design: Pre-Service Teacher Capacity-Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogical methods and foundational understanding of Web 2.0 tools
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning space configuration using a BYOD environment, with access to open educational resources (OER)

learning_goals: Learners can perform web-based activity design to resolve actual classroom situations according to case-based reasoning (CBR) principles
Learners can establish a collaborative system to provide feedback on peer teachers' instructional design processes by applying scaffolding strategies
Learners can build discipline-specific case libraries using open resources and practice knowledge sharing

resources: Web 2.0 Tool Access Accounts (Padlet, Google Workspace, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
